title: What are the latest tools used in teaching math to kids with learning disabilities? - Quora

response.answer_text: Teaching students with disability is truly a very difficult task. some of the techniques and technology that I have come across are: Text-To-Speech Assistive ToolsThe Intel Reader is a mobile handheld device that uses TTS technology to read printed text aloudFM SystemsSound-Field SystemsSip-and-puff systems are used by students who have mobility challenges, such as paralysis and fine motor skill disabilities.Besides the best way to provide therapy to kids is through an institution that has expertise of doing that. And one name that comes to mind that tops other is MBCN. Mata Bhagvati Chandan Niketan is school for special kids and they use latest technology to help special kids.
It's a long way from the latest, but I still think Stern blocks are very good.
